oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Appalachian Exposition 1911 Minnehaha postcard
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: F.E. Moore
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Minnehaha With "Hiawatha" at Appalachian Exposition, Knoxville, Tenn. Copyright 1922 by F.E. Moore. Published by F.E. Moore, Middletown, Ohio. Unused postcard.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Postcards; Portraits; Indigenous peoples; Costumes; Exhibitions;
